inputs.name: LabVMId
inputs.label: Lab VM ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Resource ID of the lab VM to stop. Default is `$(labVMId)`. You can use any variable such as `$(labVMId)`, which is the output of calling **Create Azure DevTest Labs VM**, that contains a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}/virtualMachines/{vmName}`. See [Wiki](https://github.com/rfennell/AzurePipelines/wiki/DevTestLabs) for details
